titles.title: Authorizing the printing of "United States Capitol Grounds: Landscape Architect Frederick Law Olmstead's Design for Democracy" as a House document.
Authorizing the printing of "United States Capitol Grounds: Landscape Architect Frederick Law Olmstead's Design for Democracy" as a House document.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Mr. Harper asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: (Sec. 1) Authorizes the printing of the book titled "United States Capitol Grounds: Landscape Architect Frederick Law Olmstead's Design for Democracy," prepared by the Office of the Architect of the Capitol (AOC), as a House document, including additional copies for the use of the AOC.
